author: dokurizi.sam
title: Dokurizi - decentralised journalism
description: Good Journalism has been disrupted and battered by "fast content" on social media, heavy censorship and falling subscription numbers.
solution: DOKURIZI is a self-publishing platform for journalists where their work can be minted as NFTs. Enabling them to connect with communities.
experience: I am a former journalist who now teaches journalism at NTU, Singapore. I've built two successful media start-ups(exited 2019).
